li.a: VCL Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

div.style: border: solid 1px black; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: #b40706 ;margin-left: 5px;

div.p: Another week away from our students, means another week we miss out on more memories! Here is a few to hold us over for today....#missingourJayhawks

We understand a lot of stuff is hard right now! Lets share some of the positive stuff to encourage.
Share with us something positive, exciting, and/or encouraging. Let’s life each other up! Vandy Strong!

When I say Red, you say White!
When I say Go, you say Jayhawks!

p.a: Event: Postoned to 5/23 HS Prom @ Hilltop Manor

h3.a: VCL Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan

div.p: VCL Continuity of Learning and COVID-19 Response Plan
A letter to our community in regards to the Coronavirus that has been in the news recently.
Parents, please take a moment to read a letter from the Office of the Prosecuting Attorney in regards to threats made to school communities. I ask that you take the time and discuss the serious...
